entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
